00007 const std::string colorFilterName = "Color filter";
00008 const std::string waveFilterName = "Wave filter";

00017 class CColorFilter : public CVideoFilter
00018 {
00019     double cr, cg, cb;
00020     long p;
00021 
00022 public:
00023 
00024     void Default()
00025     {
00026         cr = 1.0;
00027         cg = 1.0;
00028         cb = 1.0;
00029     }
00030 
00031     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00032     {
00033         name = colorFilterName;
00034         info["red"] = cr;
00035         info["green"] = cg;
00036         info["blue"] = cb;
00037     }
00038 
00039     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00040     {
00041         Default();
00042         if(conf.count("red") != 0) cr = conf["red"];
00043         if(conf.count("green") != 0) cg = conf["green"];
00044         if(conf.count("blue") != 0) cb = conf["blue"];
00045     }
00046 
00047     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00048 };

00050 class CWaveFilter : public CVideoFilter
00051 {
00052     double speed, offset;
00053     int width, height, nwidth;
00054     int vw;
00055 
00056     BITMAP *tmp;
00057 
00058     time_t ltime;
00059 public:
00060 
00061     CWaveFilter() : vw(0), tmp(NULL)
00062     {
00063     }
00064 
00065     ~CWaveFilter()
00066     {
00067         if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp);
00068     }
00069 
00070     void Default()
00071     {
00072         speed = 0.0;
00073         height = 25;
00074         width = 5;
00075     }
00076 
00077     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00078     {
00079         name = waveFilterName;
00080         info["speed"] = speed;
00081         info["height"] = height;
00082         info["width"] = width;
00083     }
00084 
00085     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00086     {
00087         Default();
00088         if(conf.count("speed") != 0) speed = conf["speed"];
00089         if(conf.count("height") != 0) height = (int)conf["height"];
00090         if(conf.count("width") != 0) width = (int)conf["width"];
00091         if(width < 0) width = 0;
00092         if(height < 0) height = 0;
00093         if(speed < 0) speed = 0;
00094         if(speed > 50) speed = 50;
00095         if(vw != w)
00096         {
00097             if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp);
00098             tmp = create_bitmap_ex(bpp, w, 2);
00099             vw = w;
00100         }
00101     }
00102 
00103     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00104 };

00106 #define MAX_FRAMES  52
00107 class CDelayFilter : public CVideoFilter
00108 {
00109     int vw, vh;
00110     int delay;
00111     int start_index, size;
00112     BITMAP *dbmp[MAX_FRAMES];
00113 
00114 public:
00115 
00116     CDelayFilter() : vw(0), vh(0), start_index(0), size(0)
00117     {
00118     }
00119 
00120     virtual ~CDelayFilter()
00121     {
00122         for(int i=0;i<MAX_FRAMES;i++)
00123             if(dbmp[i]) destroy_bitmap(dbmp[i]);
00124     }
00125 
00126     void Default()
00127     {
00128         delay = 0;
00129     }
00130 
00131     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00132     {
00133         name = delayFilterName;
00134         info["delay"] = delay;
00135     }
00136 
00137     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00138     {
00139         Default();
00140         if(conf.count("delay") != 0) delay = (int)conf["delay"];
00141         if(delay >= MAX_FRAMES-1) delay = MAX_FRAMES-2;
00142         if(w != vw || h != vh)
00143         {
00144             start_index = 0;
00145             size = 0;
00146             vw = w;
00147             vh = h;
00148             for(int i=0;i<MAX_FRAMES;i++)
00149                 dbmp[i] = create_bitmap_ex(bpp, w, h);
00150         }
00151     }
00152 
00153     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00154 };

00179         info["treshold"] = tresh;
00180         info["color"] = color;
00181     }

00183     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00184     {
00185         Default();
00186         if(conf.count("treshold") != 0) tresh = (int)conf["treshold"];
00187         if(tresh > 255) tresh = 255;
00188         if(tresh < 0) tresh = 0;
00189         if(conf.count("color") != 0) color = (int)conf["color"];
00190         if(color > 1) color = 1;
00191         if(color < 0) color = 0;
00192     }

00247 class CWeightFilter : public CVideoFilter
00248 {
00249     int vw, vh, speed;
00250     uint8_t *rweight;
00251     uint8_t *gweight;
00252     uint8_t *bweight;
00253 
00254     long p;
00255     uint8_t *rw;
00256     uint8_t *gw;
00257     uint8_t *bw;
00258     int32_t *i;
00259     int sp;
00260 
00261 public:
00262 
00263     CWeightFilter() : vw(0), vh(0), rweight(NULL), gweight(NULL), bweight(NULL)
00264     {
00265     }
00266 
00267     virtual ~CWeightFilter()
00268     {
00269         if(rweight) delete[] rweight;
00270         if(gweight) delete[] gweight;
00271         if(bweight) delete[] bweight;
00272     }
00273 
00274     void Default()
00275     {
00276         speed = 1;
00277     }
00278 
00279     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00280     {
00281         name = weightFilterName;
00282         info["speed"] = speed;
00283     }
00284 
00285     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00286     {
00287         Default();
00288         if(conf.count("speed") != 0) speed = (int)conf["speed"];
00289         if(speed > 10) speed = 10;
00290         if(speed < 0) speed = 0;
00291         if(w != vw || h != vh)
00292         {
00293             vw = w;
00294             vh = h;
00295             if(rweight) delete[] rweight;
00296             if(gweight) delete[] gweight;
00297             if(bweight) delete[] bweight;
00298             rweight = new uint8_t[w*h];
00299             gweight = new uint8_t[w*h];
00300             bweight = new uint8_t[w*h];
00301             memset(rweight, 0, w*h);
00302             memset(gweight, 0, w*h);
00303             memset(bweight, 0, w*h);
00304         }
00305     }
00306 
00307     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00308 };

00338 class CSquareFilter : public CVideoFilter
00339 {
00340     int size;
00341     BITMAP *tmp;
00342 
00343 public:
00344 
00345     CSquareFilter() : tmp(NULL) {}
00346     virtual ~CSquareFilter() { if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp); }
00347 
00348     void Default()
00349     {
00350         size = 1;
00351     }
00352 
00353     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00354     {
00355         name = squareFilterName;
00356         info["size"] = size;
00357     }
00358 
00359     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00360     {
00361         Default();
00362         if(conf.count("size") != 0) size = (int)conf["size"];
00363         if(size > 50) size = 50;
00364         if(size < 1) size = 1;
00365         if(tmp == NULL || w != tmp->w || h != tmp->h)
00366         {
00367             if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp);
00368             tmp = create_bitmap_ex(bpp, w, h);
00369         }
00370     }
00371 
00372     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00373 };

00375 class CFadeawayFilter : public CVideoFilter
00376 {
00377     int size, time, effect;
00378     BITMAP *tmp, *tmp2;
00379 
00380 public:
00381 
00382     CFadeawayFilter() : tmp(NULL), tmp2(NULL) {}
00383     virtual ~CFadeawayFilter() { if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp); }
00384 
00385     void Default()
00386     {
00387         size = 0;
00388         time = 0;
00389     }
00390 
00391     void GetInfo(std::string &name, FilterConfig_t &info)
00392     {
00393         name = fadeawayFilterName;
00394         info["time"] = time;
00395         info["effect"] = effect;
00396     }
00397 
00398     void Config(int bpp, int w, int h, FilterConfig_t &conf)
00399     {
00400         Default();
00401         if(conf.count("time") != 0)
00402         {
00403             int ltime = time;
00404             time = (int)conf["time"];
00405             if(ltime != time) size = 0;
00406         }
00407         if(time > 1000) time = 1000;
00408         if(time < 0) time = 0;
00409         if(conf.count("effect") != 0) effect = (int)conf["effect"];
00410         if(effect > 1) effect = 1;
00411         if(effect < 0) effect = 0;
00412         if(tmp == NULL || w != tmp->w || h != tmp->h)
00413         {
00414             if(tmp) destroy_bitmap(tmp);
00415             if(tmp2) destroy_bitmap(tmp2);
00416             tmp = create_bitmap_ex(bpp, w, h);
00417             tmp2 = create_bitmap_ex(bpp, w, h);
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     void Apply(BITMAP *bmp);
00422 };
